item.title: DC's Decades-Long Green Lantern Problem Had An Easy Fix According To Top Gun: Maverick Writer
item.description: The DC franchise has had an issue with Green Lantern in live-action for a while now, yet Top Gun: Maverick’s screenwriter had the answers.

item.title: Disney's Overlooked Movie With 93% On Rotten Tomatoes Is Still Crying Out For A Sequel 3 Years Later
item.description: Disney’s plan seems to be to balance new animated movies with sequels, and one underrated 2021 hit could be the perfect candidate for a follow-up.

item.title: The Godfather: 5 Reasons The First Movie Is The Best & 5 Reasons It's Part II
item.description: The Godfather and its sequel are often listed among the best movies ever made, but there’s always been a debate over which of the two is superior.
